headline: Europe Online Travel Market Report 2025: Market to Reach US$ 560 Billion by 2033 at 11.22% CAGR, Driven by Rise in Digital Bookings, Demand for Mobile-first Platforms, Personalized Recommendations
summary: The Europe Online Travel Market is poised to soar to US$ 560 billion by 2033, growing at a CAGR of 11.22% from US$ 215.05 billion in 2024. Key drivers for this remarkable growth include the rise in digital bookings, demand for mobile-first platforms, personalized AI-driven recommendations, adoption of virtual payment solutions, and a shift towards sustainable tourism.
